document.full_text: arizona representative gabrielle giffords is recovering well on thursday from a cranioplasty in houston, a critical step in her recovery from a gunshot wound to the head, her doctors said.
document.title: gabrielle giffords recovering well from cranioplasty in houston
lines_and_colors: arizona representative gabrielle giffords is recovering well on thursday from a cranioplasty in houston, a critical step in her recovery from a gunshot wound to the head, her doctors said.
